history.deleteModalDescription: This action cannot be undone. Delete this search history?

upload.uploadedFileError: Error uploading file - please try again or contact admin.

chatEmptyStateSubtitle: Enter a query or try an example

defaultExamples.1: Find emails related to Q3 budget updates.
defaultExamples.2: Search for all emails sent by John Doe in the past week.
defaultExamples.placeholder: Type a new search query (e.g., emails with attachments from last month)

gpt4vExamples.1: Find email conversations regarding the upcoming sales report.
gpt4vExamples.2: Search for all emails with meeting notes attachments.
gpt4vExamples.3: Identify emails sent to marketing team with project updates.
gpt4vExamples.placeholder: Example: Find emails with the subject 'annual review'

labels.useSemanticRanker: Use semantic ranker for email retrieval
labels.useOidSecurityFilter: Use OID security filter for emails
labels.useGroupsSecurityFilter: Use groups security filter for emails

helpTexts.promptTemplate: Overrides the prompt used to generate email search results. To append to existing prompts, start your prompt with '>>>'.
helpTexts.temperature: Sets the temperature of the request to the LLM that generates the email search results. Higher temperatures result in more creative outputs but may be less precise.
helpTexts.seed: Sets a seed to improve the reproducibility of the model's responses.
helpTexts.searchScore: Sets a minimum relevance score for search results from Azure AI Search.
helpTexts.rerankerScore: Sets a minimum score for semantic reranker results. The higher the score, the more relevant the email result.
helpTexts.retrieveNumber: Sets the number of email search results to retrieve.
helpTexts.includeCategory: Specifies a category of emails to include in the search results.
helpTexts.excludeCategory: Specifies a category of emails to exclude from the search results.
helpTexts.useSemanticReranker: Enables the semantic ranker to refine email search results.
helpTexts.useSemanticCaptions: Sends semantic captions to the model instead of the full email content.
helpTexts.suggestFollowupQuestions: Asks the model to suggest follow-up email searches.
helpTexts.useGPT4Vision: Uses GPT-4-Turbo with Vision for email attachments analysis.
helpTexts.vectorFields: Specifies embedding fields for email searches.
helpTexts.retrievalMode: Sets the retrieval mode for email search queries.
helpTexts.streamChat: Streams the search results to the UI as they are found.
helpTexts.useOidSecurityFilter: Filter email search results by the authenticated user's OID.
helpTexts.useGroupsSecurityFilter: Filter email search results by the authenticated user's groups.
